### Warm-up

.large[
Suppose that $X_1, X_2,... \overset{iid}{\sim} Uniform(0, 1)$. Let $X_{(n)} = \max\{X_1,...,X_n\}$.

.question[
Working with a neighbor, argue that $X_{(n)} \overset{p}{\to} 1$.
]
]

### Warm-up

.large[
Suppose that $X_1, X_2,... \overset{iid}{\sim} Uniform(0, 1)$. Let $X_{(n)} = \max\{X_1,...,X_n\}$.

.question[
Show that $n(1 - X_{(n)}) \overset{d}{\to} Y$, where $Y \sim Exp(1)$.
]
